BasicInfo.short: MotionDSP sells advanced computer vision and image processing software that extracts real-time data from drone video.

Products.name: Ikena Forensic
Products.description: Ikena Forensic enhances video from any source to clarify the question: What happened? Used by the London Met, NCIS, and commercial security.

news.title: Motion-based analysis can filter copyrighted video clips

Products.name: Ikena ISR
Products.description: Ikena ISR uses advanced computer vision and image processing to extract critical data from streaming drone video.

news.title: Image Stabilization For Airborne Drones Comes to Home Video
